text:
Diffbot - Palo Alto, CA

We make the web understandable to machines.

Checkout our recent Techcrunch coverage: http://techcrunch.com/2015/03/31/diffbot-discussions-api/

And see the technology applied to this very comment thread:

http://www.diffbot.com/testdrive/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.yco...

If interested, please send an email to introduce yourself to the team at jobs@diffbot.com
